description:
A Megadyne (cyborg) of http://anidb.net/ch25811 [Nagata Heayy Industries]. Never speaks a word in the anime. His name stems from his weapon, a thin long wire he uses to slice his victims into pieces.
He is http://anidb.net/ch13444 [Kiddy Phenyl]`s archenemy: Wire was responsible for killing almost her complete police squad, and her driving force for living (and having turned into a Megadyne herself) is her longing for revenge.
name: Wire
